title: GUI-Backend Integration ve Gerçek Sistem Bağlantısı

user_story.i_want: GUI üzerinden gerçek Privarion sistem modüllerini yönetebilmek
user_story.so_that: CLI kullanmadan tüm gizlilik özelliklerini aktifleştirip konfigüre edebilirim

detailed_description: Şu anda PrivarionGUI mock data ile çalışmaktadır. Bu story, GUI'yı gerçek PrivarionCore modülleri ile entegre ederek functional bir gizlilik yönetim arayüzü haline getirmeyi amaçlar. GUI, CLI tool ile aynı backend functionality'sine sahip olacak ve kullanıcılar terminal kullanmadan tüm Privarion özelliklerini yönetebilecek.

research_sources: /apple/swift-argument-parser - CLI async operations and process management
Swift Foundation Framework - Process execution patterns
key_findings: AsyncParsableCommand provides robust async CLI operations with error handling
TCA @ObservableState enables reactive SwiftUI integration with backend state
@Shared property wrapper allows real-time state synchronization between layers
Store-based architecture enables testable GUI-backend integration
NavigationStack integration supports complex UI flows with backend operations
TestStore provides comprehensive testing for async operations and state changes

technical_patterns.application: Central state management for PrivarionCore operations

technical_patterns.implementation: Hook, identity spoofing, and configuration commands

sessions.focus: Context7 research integration and architecture planning

key_decisions.rationale: Context7 research shows TCA provides robust state management, testing infrastructure, and SwiftUI integration
key_decisions.selected_approach: TCA Store with @ObservableState for reactive GUI updates

key_decisions.rationale: Context7 research confirms async CLI operations with proper error handling and validation
TCA @Shared property wrapper enables real-time GUI-CLI state sync with minimal overhead

risk_assessment.description: TCA learning curve - mitigated by Context7 documentation and patterns
Async operation complexity - mitigated by AsyncParsableCommand patterns
State synchronization performance - mitigated by @Shared efficiency

alternative_evaluation: TCA vs Pure SwiftUI - TCA selected for testability and complex state management
Direct calls vs CLI proxy - Hybrid approach with TCA Store coordination
Real-time vs polling updates - @Shared enables real-time with minimal overhead

acceptance_criteria.title: PrivarionCore Framework Integration
acceptance_criteria.then: gerçek modül durumları görüntülenir ve CLI mock data kullanılmaz

acceptance_criteria.title: Gerçek Modül Enable/Disable Functionality
acceptance_criteria.given: kullanıcı bir modülü enable/disable etmek istediğinde
acceptance_criteria.then: gerçek sistem modülü aktifleşir/deaktif olur ve durum güncellenir
technical_requirements: Error handling ve user feedback sağlanır

acceptance_criteria.title: Configuration Management Integration
acceptance_criteria.then: gerçek configuration dosyaları güncellenir ve sistem değişiklikleri uygular

acceptance_criteria.title: System Status Monitoring
acceptance_criteria.then: gerçek zamanlı sistem durumu, log entries ve module activity görüntülenir

acceptance_criteria.title: CLI Tool Compatibility
acceptance_criteria.given: GUI ile CLI tool aynı sistem üzerinde çalıştığında
acceptance_criteria.then: state synchronization sağlanır ve conflict olmaz
technical_requirements: File locking ve concurrent access handling

architecture_decisions.rationale: PrivarionCore'u hem CLI hem GUI tarafından kullanılabilir hale getirmek
architecture_decisions.implementation: Framework target oluştur, shared types ve protocols tanımla

architecture_decisions.rationale: CLI proxy yerine direct access daha performanslı ve güvenilir
architecture_decisions.implementation: PrivarionCore modules'ı doğrudan AppState'den erişilebilir yap

architecture_decisions.rationale: Real-time GUI updates için reactive programming pattern
architecture_decisions.implementation: Publishers ile system events'i GUI'ya stream et

definition_of_done: PrivarionCore framework successfully integrated with GUI
All mock data replaced with real system calls
Module enable/disable functionality works with real modules
Configuration management connected to real config files
Real-time system monitoring displays actual system status
Error handling implemented for all system interactions
Unit tests for integration layer written and passing
Integration tests with real modules passing

phase_1.title: Framework Integration Setup
tasks: Update AppState for direct module access

phase_2.title: Module Management Integration
tasks: Connect module enable/disable to real systems
Implement error handling and user feedback

risks_and_mitigations.risk: PrivarionCore modules might not work in GUI environment
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Test core modules in isolated GUI context first, implement fallback to CLI proxy
Implement proper permission handling, clear user guidance for elevated privileges
Use proven Combine patterns, implement robust error handling and retry logic

success_metrics: 100% mock data replaced with real system calls
